snippet: Tampa Bay Buccaneers cornerback Eric Wright has been arrested in Los Angeles for investigation of driving under the influence after police say he was involved in a crash near Staples Center.
abstract: Tampa Bay Buccaneers cornerback Eric Wright is arrested in Los Angeles on suspicion of drunk driving after a traffic accident.
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay Buccaneers cornerback Eric Wright has been arrested in Los Angeles for investigation of driving under the influence after police say he was involved in a crash near Staples Center.

headline.seo: Buccaneers’ Eric Wright Is Arrested in Los Angeles
headline.main: Bucs’ Cornerback Wright Is Arrested in Los Angeles
